class.rdfs:comment: A podcast is an episodic series of digital audio or video files which a user can download and listen to.
class.rdfs:label: PodcastSeries

schema:webFeed.rdfs:comment: The URL for a feed, e.g. associated with a podcast series, blog, or series of date-stamped updates. This is usually RSS or Atom.
schema:webFeed.rdfs:label: webFeed
